newInstance().Description: Create a service discovery request to search all UPnP services.

Parameters: String: ssdp search target. Cannot be null. e.g ) "ssdp:all" "upnp:rootdevice" "urn:schemas-upnp-org:device:MediaServer:2" "urn:schemas-upnp-org:service:ContentDirectory:2" "uuid:6859dede-8574-59ab-9332-123456789012"
newInstance(java.lang.String).Description: Create a service discovery request to search specified UPnP services.

ClassDesc: A class for creating a Upnp service discovery request for use with @B_android#net#wifi#p2p#WifiP2pManager#addServiceRequest_E@ and @B_android#net#wifi#p2p#WifiP2pManager#removeServiceRequest_E@
